Day 01 (24.02.2023) Time Schedule
Registration & Breakfast 08:30 a.m. to 10:00 a.m.
Inaugural Function 10:00 a.m. to 11:00 a.m.
Keynote Address 11:05 a.m. to 11:50 a.m.
Speaker I 11:50 a.m. to 12:35 p.m.
Speaker II 12:35 p.m. to 01:35 p.m.
Lunch 01:45 p.m. to 02:30 p.m.
Speaker III 02:30 p.m. to 03:15 p.m.
Poster Presentation 03:15 p.m. to 04:45 p.m.
Tea Break 04:45 p.m. to 05:00 p.m.
Entertainment Programme Followed by Dinner 05:30 p.m. to 07:30 p.m.

 [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Day 02 (25.02.2023) Time Schedule

Speaker IX 02:30 p.m. to 03:15 p.m.
Speaker X 03:15 p.m. to 03:45 p.m.
Valedictory Function Followed by High Tea 03:45 p.m. to 05:00 p.m.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Day 1

24th February 2023

08:00 AM – 07:30 PM*

(Timings are in IST – GMT+5.30)

 [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

08:00-10:00

Registration & Breakfast
10:00-11:00 Inaugural Function
Address by Guest of Honour Shri Dr. Anil Kothari
Address by Chief Guest Honourable Dr. Montu Patel, President PCI

Prof. Dr. Rajesh Sharma

Director
DRDO, New Delhi

02:30-03:00

05:30-07:30 Entertainment Followed by Dinner
